acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

judgment.error: Order not uploaded by concerned court

business_details.Business: Case record is received on transfer from the learned Additional Sessions Judge/FTC Karbi  Anglong, Diphu for disposal.       Seen and perused the order  dated 16.03.2020 passed by the learned Additional Sessions Judge, Karbi Anglong. The same be registered as Sessions Case and withdrawn from my file and transfer to the learned Assistant Sessions Judge, Karbi Anglong, Diphu for disposal.         The accused person is directed to appear before the learned court on 31.03.2020 for appearance
